#### Evolution and Current State
The evolution of incident management frameworks reflects the growing complexity of IT ecosystems.
Initially designed for basic incident response, these frameworks have expanded to encompass proactive threat detection and real-time analysis. AlertMend.io has adapted alongside these changes, offering cutting-edge features that harness the power of automation and machine learning to predict and neutralize threats before they escalate.
#### Key Components of an Effective Framework
A successful incident management framework consists of several critical components, each of which is meticulously supported by AlertMend.io:

- **Detection and Analysis**: Identifying incidents promptly through real-time monitoring.
- **Response and Resolution**: Implementing swift corrective actions to minimize impact. - **Recovery and Learning**: Evaluating incidents post-resolution to refine future strategies.
